code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const locations=['Grill N Rice - Grill N Rice Central Kitchen','Grill N Rice - BK-Methaas','Grill N Rice - SK-Methaas','Grill N Rice - DS-Methaas','Grill N Rice - GNR - DineIn','Grill N Rice - GNR 2','Grill N Rice - GNR 3','Grill N Rice - GNR 4'];export default function LocationTogglePanel(){const[active,setActive]=useState([true,false,false,false,false,false,false,false]);const toggle=index=>{const updated=[...active];updated[index]=!updated[index];setActive(updated);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-1/2 bg-white p-4 rounded shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"font-semibold",children:["Active Locations ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-gray-500",children:["Total Locations: ",locations.length]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-purple-600",children:"Select All"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-purple-600",children:"Unselect All"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"w-full mb-4 border p-2 rounded",placeholder:"Search locations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"w-full text-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Location Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"text-center",children:"Active"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:locations.map((loc,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-t hover:bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-2 px-1",children:loc}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",className:"accent-purple-600 scale-125",checked:active[index],onChange:()=>toggle(index)})})]},index))})]})]});}
